<line: 11> NANCY A. BERRYHILL

<line: 13> Acting Commissioner
<line: 14> Social Security Administration
<line: 15> Defendant.

[TEXT]
<line: 17> It is hereby ORDERED that, pursuant to the Equal Access to Justice Act, 28.
<line: 18> U.S.C. s 2412, an attorney fee in the amount of $1,141.38 is awarded to Plaintiff. It is
<line: 19> ordered that the attorney fee will be paid to Plaintiff's attorney, dependent upon.
<line: 20> verification that Plaintiff has no debt which qualifies for offset against the awarded fees.
<line: 21> pursuant to the Treasury Offset Program as discussed in Astrue v. Ratliff, 130 S.Ct.
<line: 22> 2521 (2010).  If Plaintiff has no such debt, then the check shall be made payable to
<line: 23> Plaintiff's attorney, George J. Wall, and mailed to Plaintiff's attorney's mailing address
<line: 24> at: 1336 E. Burnside St., Suite 130, Portland OR 97132. If Plaintiff has such debt, then.
<line: 25> the check for any remaining funds after offset of the debt shall be made payable to

[TEXT]
<line: 27> Page 3 - PETITION FOR EAJA FEES

[TEXT]
<line: 2> Plaintiff and mailed to Plaintiff's attorney's mailing address stated above.

[ABANDON]
<line: 4> IT IS SO ORDERED:

[ABANDON]
<line: 6> 2/28/2018
<line: 7> Date
